{"blocks":[{"key":"4uag8","text":"Add 20 µl Master Mix to each tube of the ER strip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1e9gq","text":"Vortex and spin down DNA extracts, add 30 µl of template DNA or water to each tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bbmjd","text":"Mix carefully by resuspending, remove bubbles and spin down.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4qf1n","text":"Label the following tubes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8vtr0","text":"5×1.5 ml tubes: ER, AL, FI, EB-1, EB-2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"16eg3","text":"1×5 ml tube: PCR","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f1r7","text":"0.2 ml PCR strips: ER, AL, FI, PCR","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31vdk","text":"Label the 50 ml waste tube, PB tube and PE tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dotr2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cb68b","text":"Aliquot EB buffer in tubes EB-1 and EB-2: each [# of samples]x30 µl plus 10%","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50sbo","text":"Aliquot water for Master Mixes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5uf2f","text":"ER:  [# of samples]×12.50 µl plus 10%","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddsvj","text":"FI: [# of samples]×12.20 µl plus 10%","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"i60h","text":"PCR:  [# of samples]×17.00 µl plus 10%","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9t86b","text":"Prepare PE (wash) buffer by adding ethanol and aliquoting to a 50 ml tube:  [# of samples]x1380 µl plus 10%","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b402l","text":"Aliquot PB buffer to a 50 ml tube: [# of samples]x1000 µl plus 10%","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5hpu2","text":"Take DNA extracts out of the freezer to thaw at room temperature. Change gloves.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"algtl","text":"Aliquot PE buffer to a 50 ml tube:  [# of samples]x1380 µl plus 10%","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
